channel.title: Multiplatform on Sergio Belda

item.title: Giving powers to the Navigation Compose library
item.description:
Navigation Compose Extended is a multiplatform complementary library for Navigation Compose to improve creation of navigation elements, such as destination routes, arguments, deep links, â€¦ in a more idiomatic way than using literals. It also provides Safe navigation routes and Safe navigation arguments.

Usage Link to heading

This library can be used programmatically or using annotations to generate classes. In the following lines, annotations are used to create navigation elements.
